title: Awarding of the Contracts for buildings to be constructed at the University of the Visual & Performing Arts and the Sri Lanka Institute of Advanced Technological Education
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Lakshman Kiriella, the Minister of Higher Education and Highways, to award the contracts pertaining to the construction of  a building and landscaping for the Faculty of Visual Arts at the University of Visual & Performing Arts and the contract for the construction of academic and administration buildings for the Sri Lanka Institute of Advanced Technological Education located in areas in Galle, Gampaha, Kandy, Kurunegla and Samanthurei, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
